segments.text: What kind of life do you prefer , city life or country life ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In comparison to city life , the country life is quiet and peaceful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it doesn't have all the modern convenience offered by the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I agree.Every wall has two sides .
segments.speaker: S2
